70010000024711.description:
Participate in the extraction of large-scale marine facilities from the bottom of the sea, in the transport and assembly of large offshore installations, as well as in rescue and transport missions.

In a special game mode, you will take direct control of crew members and appropriate accessories (e.g. fire extinguishers, fire hoses, water cannons, inflatable boats, searchlights) to defend the ship against pirate attacks, put out a fire or pick out survivors.

70010000024727.name: Tennis Go
70010000024727.description:
A fun and simple to play Tennis game for everyone!

Now you can play Tennis anytime, anywhere with Tennis Go. simply use the stick to control your character around the court to hit the ball and with a blend of speed and control win the crucial point and become the grand slam champion

Chose between many fun characters to play with to defeat your opponent with.

Tennis GO is for all ages and has been made so anyone can easily play.

70010000024729.name: Romancing SaGa 3
70010000024729.intro: Experience a brand-new HD remaster of the legendary 1995 RPG masterpiece.
70010000024729.description:
The celebrated RPG classic comes West for the first time! Developed by industry veterans including the legendary developer Akitoshi Kawazu, Romancing SaGa™ 3 was originally released in Japan in 1995. This HD remaster of the legendary RPG masterpiece introduces optimized graphics, a new dungeon to explore, new scenarios and a new game+ function. Select one of the 8 unique protagonists and embark on an epic adventure defined by your own choices!

Once every 300 years, the Rise of Morastrum threatens the existence of our world. All born in that year are doomed to perish before its end. However, there came a time when a sole child did survive. He was using the power of death to conquer the world. Yet one day, he vanished. Another 300 years passed, and again a child defied fate. She came to be known as the Matriarch. It has been 300-odd years since the appearance of the Matriarch. Humanity now stands at the fulcrum between hope and despair. Will there be another child of destiny?

70010000024795.name: Strange Telephone
70010000024795.intro: Make telephone calls to embark on a journey.
70010000024795.description:
・A 2D adventure game where you explore a mysterious realm.
Jill is trapped in a dark world, and in front of her floats a large mysterious door.
To her aid comes Graham, a strange entity in the form of a telephone.
By typing 6 numbers into Graham, Jill can cause the realm to transform.
The resulting characteristics of the space depend on the numbers you input into the phone.
Try different combinations and explore, gather items to help you and find the key that will open the floating door, allowing you to escape this dark world.

There are several conclusions to this story. Guide Jill to all of the different endings and discover the truth behind the world of Strange Telephone.

70010000024832.name: ANIMUS: Harbinger
70010000024832.intro: The shadow of a dead king summons you to battle. Strike down the corrupt whom taint the land.
70010000024832.description:
These are the days before Ire: Blood Memory, the days when Kerr the Breaker’s evil slipped its way into Cadmeia. You, Forlorn — follower of the Resonant, and caught out of time and place — are called upon by the shadow of the late King Cadmus to bring judgement to those that have betrayed the land. Only you can take on this duty, as you are forgotten, and those forgotten can never die, as they have truly never lived. Be the hand of deliverance and mercy to the afflicted. You will have no friend save for your trusty blade, axe, and hammer. Answer the call of this dead sovereign.

■ Game Features
• Compact stage and boss fight game
• Main quests (21)
• Sidequests - Trial (12) / Proof (6) / Passage (random boss)
• Proficiency tree
• Skill shards
• Reinforcement system
• Farming equipment and materials
• Difficulty (3)
• Weapons, armour, and accessories of different types and attributes

70010000024862.name: One Person Story
70010000024862.intro: This game is a personal story. Just like life, it’s a puzzle of obstacles and friendships, a rollercoaster of downs and ups, pain and hope.
70010000024862.description:
You will evolve and grow up in a minimalist and beautiful environment full of characters, objects and events that represent life situations. Sometimes there is pain, like when our little hero crushes on spikes. But friends always help and open the doors that stop us – so we can keep moving on. Thinking hard always offers solutions to our problems. Discover and make your own journey now with us!

Features of One Person Story:
-    A sensorial and emotional experience to remember
-    Interesting situations that will challenge your problem-solving skills
-    100 levels with various mechanics introduced on the go
-    Meditative soundtrack and graphics

70010000025067.name: Ritual: Crown of Horns
70010000025067.description:
Ritual: Crown of Horns is a slaughterhouse: a fast-paced action game set in an alternate Wild West, a demonic version of a hellish frontier. This arcade-inspired title unravels a tale about an unlikely duo: a bounty hunter who comes back from beyond the grave, yearning to exact revenge on his killers and a witch who aids him with a series of powerful rituals to further her own agenda.

Push back hordes of enemies, while the witch performs her ritual. Use a whole arsenal to your advantage: mindfully swapping between weapons and spells. Unlock new tools and powerful items boosting your character. Travel throughout the Weird West picking your missions and planning future unlocks to finally exact your revenge! 

Ritual: Crown of Horns is a skill based game, where split-second decisions and planning on the go are more powerful than button mashing and throwing yourself mindlessly at enemies.

70010000025193.name: Football Game
70010000025193.intro: Join Tommy for a Night Like No Other
70010000025193.description:
Tommy is the local high school football hero in the small town of East Bend, USA. It’s game night for the Purchase County Turbines and his sweetheart is waiting in the bleachers. 

However, something is amiss…

Inspired by classic 80s and 90s point and click adventures, get ready for a night you won’t forget in this twisted thriller. Navigate and explore the environment by interacting with objects, and inspecting them to solve puzzles in order to help Tommy find his sweetheart. 

Features:
 * Traditional point and click adventure game aesthetic with puzzles and dialogue interactions.
 * Meet a cast of characters including friends, foes, teachers, and a concerned mother.
 * An award-winning OST by UK duo JUPITER-C.

70010000025347.name: Riverbond
70010000025347.intro: Riverbond is a fun and frantic couch co-op adventure game for 1 to 4 players set in a stunning voxel world.
70010000025347.description:
Embark on a heroic journey to complete missions, battle adorable enemies, and smash everything into tiny cubes! Will you and your friends be the legendary heroes of Riverbond?

The Knight has imprisoned the leaders of the Eight Worlds, causing chaos, droughts and disarray! Adventure together to defeat evil and help the charming citizens of Riverbond in this action-packed journey through beautiful, hand-crafted worlds. Unlock a variety of weapons, equip new skins, and activate power-ups to hack and slash your way to glory!

Classic Single Player or Chaotic Couch Co-op! 
Whether in single player or taking it up a notch in chaotic couch co-op, you can play this epic adventure your way. With drop-in, drop-out couch co-op, everyone wins together!

Cubic Combat and Awesome Voxel Destruction
With a selection of fast and responsive weapons, wreaking havoc on everything is always satisfying. Topple massive towers with a swoosh of your sword, get trigger happy on mobs of enemies, and explode environments into colourful bursts of voxel goodness!

Cute Characters and Deadly Bosses
Meet charming characters, make unexpected allies, and battle with cute (but deadly!) bosses. Choose from over 50 weapons to suit your play style and triumph over evil. Cue epic adventure music!

70010000025413.name: Sudoku Relax 3 Autumn Leaves
70010000025413.intro: Let your mind take a break and refresh itself to the mind-soothing effects of Sudoku.
70010000025413.description:
The popular "Sudoku Relax" title is coming out with a sequel, "Sudoku Relax 3".
This new title is filled with warm autumn colors and brings a sense of calm.

Choose from EASY, NORMAL, or HARD modes with over 300 puzzles.
Exercise your brain and wind down to the relaxing gameplay and music.

Solving puzzles unlocks new backgrounds and music tracks.
The game contains 3 backgrounds and 3 music tracks.

You can choose to pause the game at any time and continue playing at your convenience.
Simple touch controls make playing easy.

70010000025419.name: Baobabs Mausoleum Ep.3: Un Pato en Muertoburgo
70010000025419.description:
After the macabre and horrific events suffered in the second chapter of Baobabs Mausoleum, here comes the final episode full of sordid stays in limbo, golf courses watched over by enchilada-shaped clouds, trips to the internet of the Marianas and a final outcome with a high risk of causing you very negative effects both in the eyesight and in the brain; the final episode of Baobabs Mausoleum is here ready to make you completely crazy.  

Welcome to Flamingo's Creek. 64 inhabitants

70010000025421.name: Dr Kawashima's Brain Training for Nintendo Switch
70010000025421.description: Get ready to challenge your brain in a variety of ways in Dr Kawashima’s Brain Training for Nintendo Switch! Enjoy new exercises, some of them making use of the right Joy-Con’s IR Motion Camera, or tap and train with classic exercises from past Brain Training games that you can play using a stylus (included with the packaged version from retail stores) or your finger. It’s in your hands!

70010000025797.name: Skybolt Zack
70010000025797.description:
A New Generation of arcade game
Skybolt Zack is the result of a unique way of mixing platformer mechanics and colour matching gameplay. 

Controls are tight and Zack’s ability to rocket punch, dash, focus, change direction when destroying an enemy and more, offers more depth than what meets the eye - following the “easy to learn, hard to master” mantra.

It’s a platformer where you don’t jump, and a music game where you dictate your own rhythm. It feels like no other game!

Features
• 48 frantic challenging levels that can all be completed without putting a foot back on the ground
• Branching routes with different levels of difficulty
• More than 15 environments divided into 5 distinct worlds
• An art style combining 3D assets and digital painted textures with tons of FX and explosions!
• Evolutive soundtrack inspired by famous platformers from the 90’s
• More than a dozen types of robotic enemies for renewed challenges throughout the game
• Dedicated speedrun and score attack modes
• 2 different leaderboards: one for the best scores and one for the best times on every level
• Fully customizable controls and colour-blind options
• No boring dialogue! (You’d have skipped them anyway...)

Different routes
Discover multiple routes that lead to different exists across every level, allowing for tons of replayability!

There are no difficulty settings in Skybolt Zack - beginners will take the easier lower routes, only the best will reach the upper paths to unlock the most challenging levels!

Superplayer modes
In addition to the story mode, Skybolt Zack offers two additional gameplay modes for an extra challenge for the more competitive players!

Time Attack - dedicated to those in search of the fastest times, providing them with tools to work on improving their run.
Score Attack - ideal for those wanting to focus on achieving the possible highest score.

Leaderboards
As focusing on scoring points and playing for the fastest time leads to very different strategies, Skybolt Zack includes 2 worldwide leaderboards: one for the highest score and one for the best times. Just go for it!

70030000007202.name: Professor Lupo and his Horrible Pets (Demo)

70030000007624.name: TINY METAL: FULL METAL RUMBLE DEMO

70030000008221.name: Super Mega Baseball 2: Ultimate Edition Demo

70030000008281.name: Cadence of Hyrule – Crypt of the NecroDancer Featuring The Legend of Zelda Demo

70030000008401.name: Bear With Me: The Lost Robots Demo

70030000008521.name: Dragon Quest® XI S: Echoes of an Elusive Age - Definitive Edition Demo

70030000009021.name: The Tenth Line Special Edition DEMO

70030000009041.name: Ori and the Blind Forest: Definitive Edition Demo

70030000009541.name: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 Demo

70050000004224.name: Splatoon 2: Octo Expansion
70050000004224.description:
Introducing Splatoon 2: Octo Expansion, a hefty new single-player mode for Splatoon 2!

You’ll play as a new character, Agent 8, who looks like an Octoling! She wakes up on the platform of a dark subway station... without her memories.

Splat your way through 80 shady underground test facilities in a massive subterranean world, where a variety of missions await Agent 8 and her talents.

Expect new stories to unfold, shedding new light on beloved characters. You may think you know everything about the world of Splatoon, but these waters run deep, and so does the lore.

Escape from these twisted depths, and you’ll be able to join multiplayer matches as an Octoling!

If you purchase the Octo Expansion pass from Nintendo eShop, you'll immediately receive Octo-themed in-game gear to use in battle.

70050000004227.name: Octo-themed in-game gear
70050000004227.description: If you purchase the Octo Expansion pass from Nintendo eShop, you'll immediately receive Octo-themed in-game gear to use in battle.

70050000005362.name: Hebereke Character Pack
70050000005362.intro: Additional storylines and characters for the game.
70050000005362.description: This pack contains all 4 character DLC stories in one!

70050000008501.name: Piranha Plant
70050000008501.description:
Piranha Plant from the Super Mario series is now available as fighter DLC!
You don't need to purchase this if you received a download code as a bonus for purchasing the game early. Make sure you aren't paying for something you already have!

Note: Piranha Plant is not included in the Fighters Pass (sold separately).

70050000008502.name: Joker Challenger Pack
70050000008502.description:
Joker, the leader of the Phantom Thieves of Hearts from Persona 5, joins the battle! Turn your rebellious spirit into strength, and fight gracefully alongside the great Arsene! Joker is paired with a new stage named Mementos. With his bold style and surprising speed, Joker will take your heart!

This set contains the following:
・ Fighter: Joker
・ Stage: Mementos
・ Music: 11 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 3
・ Spirits: Joker (Phantom Thief), Joker (Student) (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Spirits from the Persona series that were added in Ver. 3.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds.
*2 Collectable via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchasing this set.
*3 Check the "Software update available: Ver. 3.0.0" news update for details on the new spirits.
*4 You can get the new Persona spirits (excluding the Joker spirits) from Vault → Shop even without purchasing this set.

70050000008503.name: Hero Challenger Pack
70050000008503.description:
The Hero from DRAGON QUEST XI S has arrived! You can attack with all kinds of spells and techniques by selecting them from a command window, just like in the DRAGON QUEST series. Past heroes from DRAGON QUEST III, IV and VIII are also available, and the stage for this set is Yggdrasil's Altar. You can also enjoy the field and battle music from each featured game!

*This DLC is included in the Fighters Pass (sold separately). If you've purchased the Fighters Pass, you don't need to purchase this set.

This downloadable content set contains the following:

・ Fighter: Hero
・ Stage: Yggdrasil's Altar
・ Music: 8 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 5
・ Spirits: Hero (DRAGON QUEST XI S), Hero (DRAGON QUEST III), Hero (DRAGON QUEST IV), Hero (DRAGON QUEST VIII) (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Spirits from the DRAGON QUEST series that were added in Ver. 4.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds.
*2 Collectable via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchasing this set.
*3 You can get the new DRAGON QUEST spirits (excluding the Hero spirits) from Vault → Shop even without purchasing this set.
*4 Check the ""Software update available: Ver. 4.0.0"" news update for details on the new spirits.

70050000008504.name: Banjo & Kazooie Challenger Pack
70050000008504.description:
The titular unlikely duo from the Banjo-Kazooie series is going strong in the world of Smash! The pack includes the stage Spiral Mountain, which, as the name suggests, rotates during battle! Finally, there's a song arrangement created by Grant Kirkhope himself!

*This DLC is included in the Fighters Pass (sold separately). If you've purchased the Fighters Pass, you don't need to purchase this set.

This downloadable content set contains the following:

・ Fighter: Banjo & Kazooie
・ Stage: Spiral Mountain
・ Music: 10 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 3
・ Spirits: Banjo & Kazooie (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Spirits from the Banjo-Kazooie series that were added in Ver. 5.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds.
*2 Collectable via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchasing this set.
*3 You can get these new spirits from Vault → Shop even without purchasing this set.
*4 Check the "Software update available: Ver. 5.0.0" news update on the Nintendo website for details on the new spirits.

70050000008505.name: Terry Bogard Challenger Pack
70050000008505.description:
Here he comes! It's the martial artist from South Town they call the Legendary Wolf: Terry Bogard from the FATAL FURY series! Better not back him into a corner; he's got some wicked super special moves!
His stage is the King of Fighters Stadium, which has invisible walls at either side. Use them to launch your opponents at high speed and KO them hard! Includes a whopping 50 tracks, 17 of which are remixed!

This downloadable content set contains the following:
・ Fighter: Terry Bogard
・ Stage: King of Fighters Stadium
・ Music: 50 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 3
・ Spirits: Terry Bogard (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Spirits from the FATAL FURY, Art of Fighting, THE KING OF FIGHTERS, SAMURAI SHODOWN and Ikari Warriors series, as well as spirits from Psycho Soldier that were added in Ver. 6.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds.
*2 Collectable via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchasing this set.
*3 You can get these spirits from Vault → Shop even without purchasing this set.
*4 Check the "Software update available: Ver. 6.0.0" news update for details on these spirits.

70050000008506.name: Challenger Pack 5
70050000008506.description:
Planned for distribution by 29.02.2020
This downloadable content set contains the following:
　・1 new fighter
　・1 new stage
　・Several new music tracks

Note: Further details will be announced periodically.

70050000008507.name:
Rex: Xenoblade Chronicles 2
Mii Fighter Costume
70050000008507.description:
Available 07/12/2018
This costume of Rex from Xenoblade Chronicles 2 is an exclusive bonus for purchasing the Fighter Pass. The set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Rex Wig
・ Rex Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000008508.name: Persona 3 Protagonist Wig + Outfit
70050000008508.description:
A Mii Fighter costume based on the protagonist of Persona 3 is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters, and naturally includes a replica of the Gekkoukan High School uniform. It even has minor details like the protagonist's headphones. Wear this to prepare for the Dark Hour!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Persona 3 Protagonist Wig
・ Persona 3 Protagonist Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000008509.name: Persona 4 Protagonist Wig + Outfit
70050000008509.description:
A Mii Fighter costume based on the protagonist of Persona 4 is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters, and it perfectly recreates Yasogami High School's uniform. Wear this and you're pretty much the leader of the Investigation Team! Maybe you'll get the urge to visit the food court at Junes!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Persona 4 Protagonist Wig
・ Persona 4 Protagonist Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000008510.name: Teddie Hat
70050000008510.description:
A Mii Fighter hat based on Teddie from Persona 4 is now available for purchase! Teddie gets to keep the un-bear-ably cute body, but you can pretend you're him with the hat. Sensei won’t fall for it, but you might fool Yosuke!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Teddie Hat

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000008511.name: Morgana Hat
70050000008511.description:
A Mii Fighter hat based on Morgana from Persona 5 is now available for purchase! The cat-like ears may be cute, but Morgana is NOT a cat! Wear this and you'll feel like one of the Phantom Thieves!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Morgana Hat

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000011187.name: Tails Hat + Outfit
70050000011187.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Tails from the Sonic The Hedgehog series is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Gunners only, which is perfect for a mechanical genius like Tails. The pop-gun may look like a toy, but it unleashes incredible power! Wear this costume and battle your friend Sonic!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Tails Hat
・ Tails Outfit (for Gunners)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000011188.name: Knuckles Hat + Outfit
70050000011188.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Knuckles from the Sonic The Hedgehog series is now available. The outfit part is for a Mii Brawler only - perfect for the no-nonsense echidna. Unleash explosive rock-breaking punches to KO your foes! Bring it on!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Knuckles Hat
・ Knuckles Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter

70050000011707.name: Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled - Electron Skins Pack
70050000011707.intro: Crash is back in the driver's seat in Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled!
70050000011707.description:
Includes:

- Electron Skins Pack - consists of the Crash™, Coco & Cortex Electron Skins, each with a unique podium animation

70050000011710.name: Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled - Nitros Oxide Edition Content
70050000011710.intro: Crash is back in the driver's seat in Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled!
70050000011710.description:
The Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled - Nitros Oxide Edition content includes:

- Nitros Oxide, Crunch, Zem and Zam characters*
- Nitros Oxide Hovercraft kart*
- Exclusive Star Skins Pack: Nitros Oxide, Crash, Coco, Cortex Star Skins with unique podium animations
- Exclusive Crunch Robot Skin with unique podium animation
- Exclusive kart paintjob
- Exclusive kart sticker pack
- Exclusive Hovercraft kart decal

*Also able to be unlocked in standard version of game through in-game challenges and rewards.

70050000011798.name: Breaking Dead
70050000011798.intro:
Introducing zombies 
to the world of Graveyard Keeper!
70050000011798.description:
Introducing Breaking Dead - the first expansion of Graveyard Keeper! 
Create an army of undead workers that automate chores around your Graveyard:

Automate gathering of stone, wood, and have zombies craft your items. 
Taking care of your graveyard's garden has never been easier when zombies do it for you. 
Create logistics chains where zombies automate sale of merchandise, for extra profit. 
Modify and upgrade your zombies (they might need better organs) to make them more efficient.

70050000012102.name: Erdrick's Helmet + Armour
70050000012102.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Erdrick from the DRAGON QUEST series is now available for purchase. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters only. The brilliant blue with gold trim and Erdrick's emblem just scream DRAGON QUEST and are sure to make you stand out! You might even feel like a legendary hero...

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Erdrick's Helmet
・ Erdrick's Armour (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000012103.name: Martial Artist Wig + Gi
70050000012103.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of the Martial Artist vocation from the DRAGON QUEST series is now available for purchase. The outfit part is for Mii Brawlers only, but both the outfit and wig change depending on whether your Mii is male or female! What if you wore this in a team battle with the Hero?

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Martial Artist Wig
・ Martial Artist Gi (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000012104.name: Veronica's Hat + Outfit
70050000012104.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Veronica from DRAGON QUEST XI S is now available for purchase. You can don the red cap and cute braids of the most powerful mage! ...Except that the outfit part is for Swordfighters. But that's fine, you can still mix it up in Smash with Veronica's favourite staff!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Veronica's Hat
・ Veronica's Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000012105.name: Slime Hat
70050000012105.description:
The Slime Hat, based on the creature from the DRAGON QUEST series, is now available for purchase. This isn't one of those bad slimes - its lovable, wobbly face is sure to make a big impression! Boing! Wear this to finally know what it's like to be a slime.

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Slime Hat

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000012119.name: Dead by Daylight - The Saw® Chapter
70050000012119.description: Life is the most precious thing we have. A gift we are given, but a gift some squander. We need to be alive and not just exist. This is where The Pig steps in - a teacher that provides those selected with an opportunity to appreciate life yet again. To fight for our own survival, or simply let go and die. David Tapp thinks otherwise. He believes that everyone is free to live their own life, without the threat of death in the shape of a trap. A seasoned detective that seeks The Pig - a search that brings him to the Gideon Meat Plant.

70050000012145.name: GOD EATER 3 - Tales of Vesperia Collaboration Yuri and Estelle's Outfits and Hairstyles
70050000012145.description:
Customize your character in GOD EATER 3 with the hairstyle and outfit of Yuri or Estelle from Tales of Vesperia!

How to Equip
After accessing the terminal in the base, select "Loadout" and then "Appearance" to edit your outfit. The items included in this content can be found in the Outfit Tops and Hairstyle categories.
Note: "TOV Yuri" can only be used by male characters, and "TOV Estelle" can only be used by female characters.

70050000012152.name: Dead by Daylight: Ash vs Evil Dead
70050000012152.description:
Ash Williams, the legendary hero from the Ash vs Evil Dead horror series, has entered the realm of the Entity. While this time the chainsaw is not his to wield, Ash knows how to escape gruesome death. Wander through The Fog as Ash and escape evil once more.

During a weekend at a cabin, Ash uncovered the Necronomicon Ex-Mortis (Book of the Dead) and awoke something dark in the woods. Evil possessed his friends, whom he was forced to kill, and his right hand, which he sawed off. For the next thirty years, Ash ran from his past, working at a Value Stop department store and seducing women in dive bars. But he screwed up one night when he read from the Necronomicon to impress a woman. Evil found him once more. After a terrible fight, Ash, drawing his last breath, was taken by the Knights of Sumeria and transported into the future. But after his deal with a demon went South, Ash found himself in the realm of the Entity, without shotgun or chainsaw.

70050000012153.name: Dead by Daylight: DARKNESS AMONG US Chapter
70050000012153.description:
Darkness Among Us is a brand-new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor, a Map and an exclusive item for the new survivor.   

The everyday contains many hazards. But the comforts of routine shroud the unfathomable risks of a threat so intimate, so familiar, that it can only be seen in hindsight. A disturbing, violent force could be raging within the people closest to you. Darkness is among us, every day.

The raw cravings and impulses of adolescence are powerful.When three teens get involved with an impulsive mastermind, they discover an addictive kind of freedom. Together, they spiral out of control and become the wrong kind of crowd, The Legion, which leaves no rule unbroken. 

Jeff Johansen was invited to take a trip down memory lane when his past caught up with him. He returned to his hometown, ready to face everything he was forced to leave behind. It’s never too late to be in the wrong place at the wrong time.

70050000012154.name: Dead by Daylight: DEMISE OF THE FAITHFUL Chapter
70050000012154.description:
The DEMISE OF THE FAITHFUL is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor, a Map, and an exclusive item for the new Survivor.

Surrender yourself to the vast inexplicable: that is the oath of the faithful. In darkness, they look inward for a beacon of light. But when their light is distorted by pride and ambition, how long will they err in the dark? 
 
The Plague found solace in sacred rituals, a way to repel the darkness she carried inside. As a High Priestess of Babylon, she believed she was invulnerable. When a sickness began to defile her body, she confronted her gods, realizing too late they were not the ones answering her prayers. 
 
Jane Romero was striving to become a TV host, an inspiring voice for those in need. Every day she would share her beliefs and practices with thousands of followers. One evening, driving home after a particularly stressful live show, she closed her eyes for a moment… and never made it home.

70050000012156.name: Dead by Daylight: HALLOWEEN® Chapter
70050000012156.description:
HALLOWEEN® is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor, a Map, and an exclusive item for the new Survivor.

To most the town of Haddonfield felt safe, a place where most went to sleep with unlocked doors. All that changed one dark Halloween when the white mask that stalks the night returned home to find his next victims. Witness the purest form of evil. Where pain is the beginning and death is the end. You’ll get to encounter Michael Myers himself. Together with Laurie Strode, you’ll either fight for survival or slaughter in their old hometown, Haddonfield.

70050000012221.name: Catan - Cities & Knights
70050000012221.description:
For the advanced player: Discover the Cities & Knights expansion! 

You will be brought to the golden age of trade and prosperity on CATAN. The new wealth of the region has attracted barbarians, and the knights of CATAN will be needed to repel the invader. Unite and defend the island of CATAN against a common enemy! But watch out, as you will also compete for the control of cities and metropolises.

70050000012318.name: Busty Special DLC Set
70050000012318.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012318.description:
This set has the following 11 items for use with SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball:

▼Set Details
- Outfits: Secret Haunting Ground Girl, Wonderland Showgirl
- Accessories: Showgirl Hat, Showgirl's Cane
- Diorama Poses: Charming Pose, Seductive Pose
- Peach Balls: Asuka's Bra Ball, Yumi's Bra Ball, Yomi's Bra Ball, Murasaki's Bra Ball, Ryōna's Bra Ball

70050000012327.name: Meltdown Pack
70050000012327.intro: The toughest pack of them all!
70050000012327.description: If you're looking for a challenge, the Meltdown Pack is for you. Five of the toughest dexterity games around: Rainbow Puzzle, Rabbits in Corn, Golden Rod, Discuss and Juggle! Can you complete any of these games in under a minute?

70050000012356.name: New Outfit Quartet
70050000012356.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012356.description:
This set has the following 8 items for use with SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball:

▼Set Details
- Outfits: Animal Breeder, Happy Poster Girl, Marchen Dress, Japanese Bikini
- Accessories: Animal Breeder's Cap, Happy Ribbit Cap, Marchen Ribbon, Japanese Bikini Clip

70050000012357.name: Outfit Sextet 1
70050000012357.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012357.description:
This set has the following 9 items for use with SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball:

▼Set Details
- Outfits: Pirate, Top Cover T-Shirt, Bubbles, High-Leg Swimsuit, Topping Suit, Bubble Shirt
- Accessories: Pirate Hat, Chocolate (Head), Peep-Peep Hairclip

70050000012358.name: Outfit Sextet 2
70050000012358.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012358.description:
This set has the following 8 items for use with SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball:

▼Set Details
- Outfits: Fluffy Santa, Sexy Maid, Sexy Miko, Sexy Open Dress, Sexy Waitress, Eternal Summer Camisole
- Accessories: Miko Headdress, Open Dress Hairclip

70050000012359.name: New Accessories Quintet
70050000012359.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012359.description:
This set has the following 5 items for use with SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball:

▼Set Details
- Accessories: Fan, Carrot, Transformation Leaf, Pet Bowl, Salmon

70050000012360.name: New Diorama Pose Quintet
70050000012360.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012360.description:
This set has the following 5 items for use with SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball:

▼Set Details
- Diorama Motion: Grooming, Shake, Hop Hop, Snipe!, Shh

70050000012361.name: SENRAN KAGURA SV Stage BGM
70050000012361.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012361.description:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA Shinovi Versus in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

70050000012362.name: SENRAN KAGURA EV Stage BGM
70050000012362.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012362.description:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA ESTIVAL VERSUS in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

70050000012363.name: SENRAN KAGURA PBS Stage BGM
70050000012363.intro: SENRAN KAGURA has transformed into a sexy pinball game on the Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012363.description:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA Peach Beach Splash in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

70050000012364.name: SENRAN KAGURA DC Stage BGM
70050000012364.intro: SENRAN KAGURA is getransformeerd naar een sexy flipperkast spel op de Nintendo Switch™!
70050000012364.description:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA 2: Deep Crimson in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

70050000012365.name: Politics Pack
70050000012365.intro: Relive the important issues of the day.
70050000012365.description: This pack of games includes Blackout, Keep 'em Rolling for Victory, Oom Paul and Race for the Pole.

70050000012366.name: All Balls Pack
70050000012366.description: Whirlpool, Harlequin, Speech Day and Puss in the Corner all feature ball-based puzzles. You'll need a steady hand to guide these balls to their goals. Get rolling!

70050000012367.name: Hobby Pack
70050000012367.description: The Hobby Pack collects games with sports and activities themes. Bowling, Double-Six, Divers and Foxhunt are all here to challenge you!

70050000012368.name: Critters Pack
70050000012368.intro: Bees, cats and pigs, oh my!
70050000012368.description: The Critters Pack features games themed around our animal friends. Beehive, Cat and Mouse, Pondsnag and Greased Pigs all feature challenging puzzles with animal themes.

70050000012422.name: Experience x3 - Legend of the Tetrarchs
70050000012422.description:
Experience gained in battles is tripled.
Settings can be changed in the Additional Content section of the menu.

70050000012423.name: No Encounters - Legend of the Tetrarchs
70050000012423.description:
Enables the feature to turn ON/OFF enemy encounters.
Settings can be changed in the Additional Content section of the menu.

70050000012426.name: Damage x2 - Legend of the Tetrarchs
70050000012426.description:
Damage dealt to enemies in battles is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Additional Content section of the menu.

70050000012434.name: Modernist Pack
70050000012434.description: This pack includes more than 70 different recipes to construct modern-looking structures, as well as additional hairstyles and clothing. Players can take their architectural skills to the next level by building a fashionable luxury hotel.

70050000012541.name: Aquarium Pack
70050000012541.description: Check the mailbox on the Isle of Awakening to discover a fishing island with a net full of quests and characters to meet. Learn how to catch 40 different fish that can be added to a DIY aquarium. Unlock the fishing rod as well as customisation options, including swimwear, straw hats and a ponytail hairstyle.

70050000012542.name: Hotto Stuff Pack
70050000012542.description: This pack includes more than 40 recipes to design and decorate structures that look similar to the Hotto Steppe – a popular resting area in a distant land where visitors can take a break from their travels. Players will also get access to an additional island to gather the materials they’ll need to build these recipes.

70050000012609.name: Into the Dead 2: George A. Romero’s Night of the Living Dead Add On
70050000012609.intro: Fight for Survival in the Iconic Cinematic Universe
70050000012609.description: Follow the story of Ben and his grueling encounters prior to the events of the iconic film. Experience the unexplained events of the zombie uprising as you team up with country girl Alice in a fight for survival across 12 levels.

70050000012610.name: Into the Dead 2: Ghostbusters Add On
70050000012610.intro: Join the Ghostbusters in an all new action adventure battling specters, spooks, and demons to save the city!
70050000012610.description: Strap on your Proton Pack and join Egon, Winston, Peter, and Ray as a new rookie Ghostbuster recruited to investigate a paranormal disturbance. Bring Slimer along to add an extra otherworldly boost!

70050000012615.name: Dead by Daylight: CHARITY CASE
70050000012615.description: You’ve watched your favorite broadcasters play Dead by Daylight and show off their exclusive outfits, now you can finally get your hands on those amazing threads and proudly display your fandom! On top of that, 100% of Behaviour Digital's proceeds from the sale of this item will go to the Brain & Behavior Research Foundation. The Charity Case is a collection of 26 cosmetic items for many of the Dead by Daylight survivors and killers. It contains 20 brand new customization options based on your favorite broadcasters and 6 previously exclusive items from old friends.

70050000012616.name: Dead by Daylight: STRANGER THINGS Chapter
70050000012616.description:
STRANGER THINGS is a brand-new Chapter for Dead by Daylight that features a new Killer and two new Survivors. The Entity descends upon the midwestern town of Hawkins, Indiana as Stranger Things, the critically acclaimed Netflix Original Series, enters the realm of Dead by Daylight.  

The Stranger Things Chapter includes a new map, the Underground Complex, located below the Hawkins National Laboratory. A Demogorgon is the new untamable Killer. Against the Demogorgon stands not one, but two new Survivors: Nancy Wheeler, a tough aspiring journalist, and Steve Harrington, a former high school jock with a knack for finding trouble. The Stranger Things Chapter also features two exclusive cosmetic items: Steve’s Scuffed Rolled Sleeves and Nancy’s Torn Sweatshirt.

70050000012670.name: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Indianapolis Motor Speedway Track
70050000012670.description: The most prestigious track in the United States ever since it was built in 1909, the Indianapolis Motor Speedway is the second oldest purpose-built motor racing circuit in the world. Its capacity, with room for over 400,000 spectators, makes it an ideal setting for legendary motorsport battles. In ETRC, Indianapolis is the ideal track for showing off the power of trucks.

70050000012743.name: Experience x3 - Asdivine Dios
70050000012743.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000012745.name: SP x3 - Asdivine Dios
70050000012745.description:
All characters' SP gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000012747.name: Experience & SP x2 - Asdivine Dios
70050000012747.description:
All characters' experience and SP gained increases by 100%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000012749.name: No Encounters - Asdivine Dios
70050000012749.description:
Enables the feature to configure the encounter rate.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000012751.name: Damage x2 - Asdivine Dios
70050000012751.description:
Damage dealt to enemies is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000012753.name: Full Restore - Asdivine Dios
70050000012753.description:
All characters' HP/MP/BP are fully recovered after battle.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000012794.name: Expansion Pass
70050000012794.description:
Expand your adventure and roster of playable characters in MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order with the paid Expansion Pass, which grants access to three exclusive DLC packs that will become available as they release one at a time after the game’s launch and will not be available for individual purchase. 

DLC packs will contain new content such as playable characters, modes, and additional story

Includes content from popular franchises, like the Fantastic Four, the X-Men, and the Marvel Knights

First DLC pack will be available in Autumn 2019 

Purchase the Expansion Pass to receive an in-game alternative-colour chef outfit for Deadpool at game launch.

70050000012844.name: Dead by Daylight: Ghost Face®
70050000012844.description:
Ghost Face® is joining Dead by Daylight. Lurking in the shroud of night, he is a natural stalker who observes his victims before striking. The Ghost Face DLC includes two exclusive items for The Ghost Face: the body Monochrome Maniac and weapon Silvery Steel Tactical Knife. These items are only available as part of the DLC.

Acquaintances are a dangerous deception. The workplace is filled with them; strangers seated beside us, five days a week. A distant familiarity grown from habit; the blanks filled with assumptions as we forget how little we know, until proven otherwise. No one thought the man seated on their left could be responsible for the murder of a dozen people. Until proven otherwise.

The Ghost Face took full advantage of that fact, blending in the everyday. He would have gotten away with it as he had before: he would have packed his bags when the investigation pointed in his direction, driven a few miles, and looked for another job. 

But this time he found a richer hunting ground…

70050000012870.name: Wolfenstein®: Youngblood™ Standard Edition (International Version)
70050000012870.description:
"Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the first modern co-op Wolfenstein adventure.

Team up with a friend or play solo as one of BJ Blazkowicz’s twin daughters and wield a powerful arsenal of new weapons, gadgets, and abilities to liberate Paris from the Nazis."

70050000012871.name: Wolfenstein®: Youngblood™ Trial Edition (International Version)
70050000012871.description:
"Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the first modern co-op Wolfenstein adventure.

Team up with a friend or play solo as one of BJ Blazkowicz’s twin daughters and wield a powerful arsenal of new weapons, gadgets, and abilities to liberate Paris from the Nazis."

70050000012872.name: Wolfenstein®: Youngblood™  Deluxe Edition (International Version)
70050000012872.description:
"Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the first modern co-op Wolfenstein adventure.

Team up with a friend or play solo as one of BJ Blazkowicz’s twin daughters and wield a powerful arsenal of new weapons, gadgets, and abilities to liberate Paris from the Nazis.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

- The Buddy Pass, allowing you and a friend to play the entire game together, even if they don't own the game themselves
- The Cyborg Skin Pack"

70050000012882.name: Wolfenstein®: Youngblood™ Legacy Pack Pre-order Incentive (International Version)
70050000012882.description:
"Like father, like daughters! 

Pre-order now to receive the Legacy Pack and unlock outfits and weapons used by BJ Blazkowicz, including:

- New Colossus Jacket power suit skin
- BJ's Army power suit skin
- Old Blood Pipe 
- Old Blood Knife
- WW2 Weapon Skin Set, for all ranged weapons

Wolfenstein: Youngblood launches on July 26, 2019."

70050000012901.name: Additional craft "Blanche" from Cybattler
70050000012901.description:
A new aircraft that features 8-way shooting, a shield and more!

Can be used in all play modes.  Includes additional arranged music for the Cybattler.

70050000012922.name: Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair - Trowzer's Top Tonic Pack
70050000012922.intro: With this pack of top tonics, players will have even more choice when customising the way they play!
70050000012922.description:
Treat yourself to "Trowzer's Top Tonic Pack" and play with even more tonics!

Largee Head! This tonic gives Laylee a comically oversized head. No cheat code required.

Glow Worm! Yooka and Laylee aren't worms but hey, look at them glow! 

D.I.S.C.O! Turn every level into a platforming party of Playtonic proportions.

Yooka 64! For fans of all things retro this tonic will be a blast from the past! No added polygons.

70050000012946.name: Dengeki Accessory Set
70050000012946.description: A set of Dengeki-themed accessories to equip.

70050000012981.name: Famitsu Weapon Set
70050000012981.description: A set of Famitsu themed weapons for all characters.

70050000012982.name: Enchanted Weapon Set

70050000012985.name: Traditional Series - Equipment Set

70050000012986.name: Enchanted Series - Equipment Set

70050000013080.description: Adds 'Justice Uniform K' to the Dressing Room.

70050000013087.name: Bloodstained: Iga's Back Pack
70050000013087.description: Koji Igarashi is back! Did you miss out on the original Kickstarter campaign that made Bloodstained possible? Fear not, with “Iga’s Back Pack” you will receive access to the powerful and fan favorite Swordwhip weapon, as well as an epic encounter against a super powerful boss; Koji Igarashi himself!

70050000013108.name: Asphalt 9: Legends Starting Racer Pack
70050000013108.description:
Get a head start with the Asphalt 9: Legends Starting Racer Pack! Unlock incredible supercars and resources to boost your progress, and challenge your friends and family in split-screen multiplayer right from the beginning.
This pack contains:
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the BMW 3.0 CSL Hommage 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the DS Automobiles DS E-Tense 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the Lotus Evora Sport 410 
• 20 Blueprints to unlock the Dodge Challenger 392 HEMI Scat Pack
• 25 Blueprints to unlock the Porsche 911 Carrera GTS 
• 200,000 Credits
• 300 Tokens

70050000013141.name: Jailbreak Support Goods
70050000013141.description:
Get outta Jail with the following equipment and items! Only for Mary Skelter 2.

Equipment:
- Circlet of Agreement
- Tunic of Amnesty
- Bracelet of Wardenship
- Stiletto of Prejudice

Consumable Items:
- Homing Amplifier x 50
- Doctor’s Med Kit x 20
- Healing AED x 10
- All-Heal Capsule x 10
- Flash Grenade x 50

70050000013142.name: Mary Skelter Game Item
70050000013142.description: This add-on content immediately unlocks the first game, Mary Skelter: Nightmares!

70050000013170.name: Neptune Swimsuit Outfit
70050000013170.description: Download this and equip Neptune's Swimsuit outfit!

70050000013171.name: Blanc Swimsuit Outfit
70050000013171.description: Download this and equip Blanc's Swimsuit outfit!

70050000013172.name: Investigator Pack
70050000013172.description: Upgrade your gaming experience with an exclusive private investigator outfit, permanent access to a first aid kit, antipsychotics and a crafting materials starter pack.

70050000013204.name: My Nintendo Store order bonus - Splatoon 2 gear set
70050000013204.description: My Nintendo Store order bonus - Splatoon 2 gear set

70050000013247.name: Bear With Me: The Complete Collection Unlock
70050000013247.intro: This content includes Bear With Me episodes 1-3.
70050000013247.description: Dark interrogations, sarcastic banter, and challenging puzzles lie in store for our heroes as they collect clues to solve a bigger, more sinister mystery. Featuring an evocative soundtrack, expansive narrative and a uniquely drawn 2D animated art-style accented by an impressive film noir style, Bear With Me will take players through an emotional rollercoaster of a journey that will determine the fates of our protagonists.

70050000013259.name: Additional Story Content
70050000013259.description:
We plan to release an additional side story by 30/04/2020.
The additional side story will include new characters, locations and battlegrounds. It will feature multiple chapters that are separate from the story of the main game.

70050000013270.name: New Attire
70050000013270.description:
We plan to release new outfits by 31/12/2019.

Second pack: released on 08/11/2019
New costumes (servants attire, summer wear, evening wear) have been released.
These can be worn by both the protagonist and their students. Costumes can be changed via your Journal in the Monastery.

Scheduled release date: 11/09/2019
First set
New attire (Glasses for the protagonist, House Loungewear) has been released.
House Loungewear is for the protagonist and for student characters. It can be changed into from your Personal Quarters and will only be displayed in the monastery, as well as in battle for certain classes. The classes for which the attire will be displayed in battle change depending on the character. Additionally, the attire change will not display for characters sent out as travelers.
The Glasses for the protagonist are an accessory that can be combined with any other outfit. The accessory can be selected from your Personal Quarters. If equipped, Glasses will be displayed on your player character at the monastery and in battle.

70050000013271.name: Additional Auxiliary Battles
70050000013271.description:
We plan to release auxiliary battle maps by 31/10/2019. Multiple map types are planned, and they will feature increased numbers of enemies that drop items.

Scheduled release date: 11/09/2019
Auxiliary battle maps and a new music option have been added.
The following auxiliary battle maps have been added:
Battle at Lake Teutates
Battle in the Forest
Battle in the Plains
Battle at the Sealed Forest
Battle at Conand Tower
Depending on your progress, one auxiliary battle map will be displayed on the battle-selection screen.
These new auxiliary battle maps will have a yellow "!" icon on the battle-selection screen. In them you will be able to obtain bullion, as well as stat-boosting items such as Ailell Pomegranate.
You will also receive more gold as a reward from these special maps.
You can challenge any map by spending one activity point.
The new music option ("Corridor of the Tempest") can be selected from "Battle Music" within "General" on the system menu while in an auxiliary battle.
You can also listen to it in the Music Library.

70050000013272.name: Additional Quests
70050000013272.description:
Released on 08/11/2019
Additional quests have been released.
Alongside the additional quests, new activities such as the sauna and feeding cats and dogs, as well as new battalions, have also been added.
While playing additional quests, a light blue icon will be shown.

70050000013273.name: Additional Items
70050000013273.description:
We plan to release support items by 31/10/2019.

Scheduled release date: 11/09/2019
Support items (Sacred Items Set) have been released. You can receive the Sacred Items Set by selecting "DLC Supplies" near your bed in your Personal Quarters.
(The items can be received for every save file that has not already received them.)
Set contents:
　　Sacred Galewind Shoes (movement +2)
　　Sacred Floral Robe (max HP +7)
　　Sacred Snowmelt Drop (strength +3)
　　Sacred Moonstone (speed +3)

70050000013274.name: Officers Academy Uniform (Byleth)
70050000013274.description: We plan on releasing an Officers Academy uniform for the player character on 26/07/2019. From your room in the monastery, you can make it so that your player character wears an Officers Academy uniform while in the monastery and when their class is the default one.

70050000013275.name: Cat Ears & Tail Set
70050000013275.description: A set of cat ears and tail for each character!

70050000013278.name: Dog Ears & Tail Set
70050000013278.description: A set of dog ears and tail for each character!

70050000013284.name: Toby's Dream
70050000013284.intro: Experience Toby's Dream, a special bonus level for Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince.
70050000013284.description:
Toby the dog, as previously seen in Nine Parchments, has his own adventure in Heatherwood Hall with the Three Heroes! Follow the pawsteps of Toby and help him find all the treats hidden in the castle and its gardens.
 
To access Toby's Dream, complete the Prince's Dream level of Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince and locate Toby's Dream in the level selection map.

70050000013286.name: Mouse Ears & Tail Set
70050000013286.description: A set of mouse ears and tail for each character!

70050000013287.name: Bunny Ears & Tail Set
70050000013287.description: A set of rabbit ears and tail for each character!

70050000013288.name: Fox Ears & Tail Set
70050000013288.description: A set of fox ears and tail for each character!

70050000013344.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - BONUS T-SHIRTS
70050000013344.description:
CONTRA is back! Two years after the Alien Wars ended, the Damned City erupts from the final battleground. From the midst of the chaos, a group of scoundrels emerge.

They might not be typical heroes, but they're here to save the world… or get rich trying.

Bonus T-Shirt skins for Hungry Beast. 
One featuring the iconic duo Bill and Lance, the other featuring the classic Contra logo.

70050000013345.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS Hungry Beast 4 T-shirts pack
70050000013345.intro: Pack of 4 T-Shirt skins for Hungry Beast.
70050000013345.description:
Includes: 
Rogue Corps logo design
Konami Code design
Alien Wars design
Lily's Hungry Beast T-Shirt

70050000013346.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - The Gentlemen Pack
70050000013346.description:
English Gentleman skin for Gentleman. 
Plus, 2 bonus T-Shirt skins for Hungry Beast.

70050000013360.name: Merciful Madness
70050000013360.description:
Dive deeper into madness with three brand new side quests exclusive to the Nintendo Switch™!

The quests explore Lovecraft’s iconic stories and bring to light the mysteries of Oakmont and its demented citizens.

70050000013361.name: Chicago Organ Grinder
70050000013361.description:
Style or power? Now you can have both with the Chicago Organ Grinder, the favourite weapon of 1920s gangsters.
This DLC includes a skin for your Tommy gun.

70050000013362.name: Worshippers of the Necronomicon
70050000013362.description: Keep the adventure going with this pack of 3 brand-new quests in which Charles Reed investigates unsolved cases and sets out in search of mysterious spell books that harbour unspeakable powers.

70050000013363.name: Experience Boost
70050000013363.description: This DLC includes a skill point that can be used from the start of the game. Use it wisely to upgrade your combat skills, vigor or mind.

70050000013401.name: Experience x3 - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013401.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013404.name: SP x3 - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013404.description:
All characters' SP gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013406.name: Experience & SP x2 - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013406.description:
All characters' experience and SP gained increases by 100%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013408.name: No Encounters - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013408.description:
Enables the feature to configure the encounter rate.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013410.name: Damage x2 - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013410.description:
Damage dealt to enemies is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013412.name: Full Restore - Illusion of L'Phalcia
70050000013412.description:
All characters' HP/MP are fully recovered after battle.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000013444.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - Retro Bill Pack
70050000013444.description:
Retro Bill skin for Kaiser. 

Plus, bonus T-Shirt skin for Gentleman and in-game items.

70050000013456.name: DAEMON X MACHINA Digital Bonus
70050000013456.description:
Free bonus if you buy DAEMON X MACHINA on Nintendo eShop:

Prototype Arsenal*
Prototype Plugsuit*
Metallic Plugsuit
ZAW-S08C Habakiri
HAW-R01C Grim Reaper
SAW-B17C Gillingr Impact
HAW-M01C Silver Raven
SAW-AM02C Thunderbird

*This downloadable content will also be available for purchase at a later date

70050000013571.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - The Gentleman Beetle Pack
70050000013571.description:
Beetle skin for Gentleman. 

Plus, bonus T-Shirt skin for Ms. Harakiri and in-game items.

70050000013572.name: CONTRA: ROGUE CORPS - Assassin Pack
70050000013572.description:
Sister .H skin for Ms. Harakiri. 

Plus, bonus T-Shirt for Kaiser and in-game items.

70050000013649.name: Swimsuit Outfit Bundle
70050000013649.description:
A bundle containing all the Swimsuit outfits for each character!
(Artisan, Blanc, Chrome, Compa, IF, Neptune, Noire and Vert)

70050000013653.name: Sentai Brave Ranger Outfit Bundle
70050000013653.description:
A bundle containing all the Sentai outfits, one set for each character!

• Artisan [Brave Orange]
• Blanc [Brave White]
• Chrome [Brave Dark]
• Compa [Brave Pink]
• IF [Brave Blue]
• Neptune [Brave Purple]
• Noire [Brave Black]
• Vert [Brave Green]

70050000013655.name: WRC 8 - Alpine A110 (1973)
70050000013655.description: The Alpine A110 is none other than the first car to win the World Rally Championship in the modern era. Many top drivers were successful in the 1970s at the wheel of this Berlinette. Agile and responsive, the Alpine A110 has incredible traction and is particularly adept at negotiating bends.

70050000013656.name: WRC 8 - Ford Escort MkII 1800 (1979)
70050000013656.description: Ford is still active in the WRC as an official manufacturer, but it had already made history with its Ford Escort RS1800. Sporting a 270hp Cosworth engine, it helped the Detroit manufacturer win its first manufacturers title in 1979. Two years later, Ari Vatanen won the drivers championship with the Escort RS1800.

70050000013657.name: WRC 8 - Lancia Delta HF Integrale Evoluzione (1992)
70050000013657.description: The Lancia Delta is the ultimate rally car! With 11 manufacturers titles and 4 drivers titles between 1974 and 1992, no other car has surpassed it in the history of the WRC. It has even won 46 of the 65 rallies it has taken part in. With its ultra-high performance, it remains a challenging car to control.

70050000013658.name: WRC 8 - Senior Staff Members Unlock
70050000013658.description: Boost the start of your career with more experienced team members for Career mode.

70050000013682.name: Party Pack
70050000013682.intro:
Expand the world of Flick Erasers!
Play new extra stages and party stages and welcome new erasers to the family!
70050000013682.description:
Get your hands on the new Party Pack!
Expand the eraser world with new stages and characters.
Play with your family or friends anytime, anywhere!

The Party Pack contains:
- 6 extra characters added to Flicky-racers
- 10 new stages added to Party Battles and Co-op
- 10 stages for Free Battle
- 10,000 bonus points

70050000013683.name: Seal the Deal
70050000013683.description:
SEAL THE DEAL introduces:

- An all-new chapter: The Arctic Cruise
- A new incredibly difficult mode: Death Wish!
- Six new Time Rifts!
- A ton of outfits, flairs, dyes and even camera filters!

Note: The Arctic Cruise requires 35 Time Pieces to access. Death Wish requires 27 Time Pieces to access.
Note: Death Wish is exceptionally, brutally difficult. Please take this into account when considering this DLC.

70050000013688.name: Pacifier Sword
70050000013688.description:
Adds item "Pacifier Sword".

*This additional content is a bonus for purchasing "Omega Labyrinth Life Deluxe Edition". It is unavailable to be purchased separately on its own.

*This additional content is a bonus for purchasing "Omega Labyrinth Life Deluxe Edition". It is unavailable to be purchased separately on its own.

70050000013695.description:

* Additional dungeons will be available as challenge dungeons after clearing the story dungeon, "Holy Cave of the Holy Blossom."

70050000013705.description:

* Costumes will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, "A Maze-like Garden", and can be accessed with the Costume Change command under either Status on the Home Menu, or the Profile command in the Gallery.

* Songs will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, "A Maze-like Garden", and can be changed from the Home Menu's BGM Settings, under Status.

70050000013728.name: Character Songs "Anberyl" Set of 15
70050000013728.description:
A bargain set of fifteen items that allows you to change the academy's BGM to an Omega Labyrinth or Omega Labyrinth Z character song.
Includes:
<Omega Labyrinth Z>
・Invincible GRAVITY (Aina Akemiya & Rio Akanezaki)
・World's Best Present (Aina Akemiya)
・Happy Chain (Nako Mito)
・Re-Do (Saeri Soja)
・Pledge Personified (Marika Hikawa)
・Chase the Longing (Mirei Shirogane)
・I'll Get You Back (Rio Akanezaki)
・Friendship is the Code! (Urara Rurikawa)
・Pai's Wonderland! (Pai)
・Stinging Heart (Chichi)

<Omega Labyrinth>
・Brave Heart (Aina Akemiya)
・A Special Recipe (Nako Mito)
・Azure Persona (Saeri Soja)
・Crimson Labyrinth (Marika Hikawa)
・Precious Time (Mirei Shirogane)

* Songs will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, "A Maze-like Garden", and can be changed from the Home Menu's BGM Settings, under Status.

70050000013742.name: Trine: Ultimate Collection (Retail)
70050000013742.intro: The iconic puzzle-platforming adventure returns in its most complete iteration yet!
70050000013742.description: Unlock Trine: Enchanted Edition, Trine 2: Complete Story, and Trine 3: The Artifacts of Power to complete your Ultimate Collection!

70050000013761.name: Maiden Costume "Swimsuit" Set of 7
70050000013761.description:
A bargain set of seven items that allows you to give your home screen character a swimsuit.
Includes:
・Costume: Hinata (Swimsuit)
・Costume: Berune (Swimsuit)
・Costume: Mei (Swimsuit)
・Costume: Mio (Swimsuit)
・Costume: Nanami (Swimsuit)
・Costume: Juri (Swimsuit)
・Costume: Yurika (Swimsuit)

* Costumes will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, "A Maze-like Garden", and can be accessed with the Costume Change command under either Status on the Home Menu, or the Profile command in the Gallery.

70050000013762.name: Maiden Costume "Animal" Set of 7
70050000013762.description:

Includes:
・Costume: Hinata (Animal)
・Costume: Berune (Animal)
・Costume: Mei (Animal)
・Costume: Mio (Animal)

・Costume: Yurika (Animal)

70050000013763.name: Character Songs "Belles Fleurs" Set of 9

70050000013871.name: Knickknack Pack
70050000013871.description: This pack includes 3 recipes to create a Pretty Paddle, Celebratory Soup, and Ornate Adornment so that you can celebrate every New Year with some Hotto flair!

70050000013946.name: My Nintendo Store order bonus - Splatoon 2 gear set
70050000013946.description: My Nintendo Store order bonus - Splatoon 2 gear set

70050000013972.name: High Res Car Textures
70050000013972.description: Download the highest quality car textures. Especially suited to TV mode.

70050000013982.name: Yapper
70050000013982.intro: The award-winning action RPG is back, bigger and better than ever!
70050000013982.description: Pre-order now and earn a pet Goblin - Yapper. Turns out he makes a pretty charming companion before his Outpost-attacking days.

70050000014038.name: Blood Maidens' Swimsuits
70050000014038.description: No Blood Skelter-ing in the pool! This unlocks a new Job class, skills, and outfits for the Blood Maidens. Only for Mary Skelter 2.

Only for Mary Skelter 2.

- Alice

Only for Mary Skelter 2.

70050000014050.name: Experience x3 - Asdivine Menace
70050000014050.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014051.description:

70050000014053.name: Experience, SP & Skill Level x2 - Asdivine Menace
70050000014053.description:

Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014054.name: No Encounters - Asdivine Menace
70050000014054.description:

Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014055.name: Damage x2 - Asdivine Menace
70050000014055.description:
Damage dealt to enemies is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014056.name: Full Restore - Asdivine Menace
70050000014056.description:
All characters' HP/MP/BP are fully recovered after battle.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000014221.name: Vests of Success Set
70050000014221.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! A pair of garments said to bring good fortune to anyone who wears them!

70050000014261.name: Wolf Wear
70050000014261.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! A cool costume that makes Erik look more charismatic than ever!

70050000014262.name: Baby Boar Set
70050000014262.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! Have some fun with one of Veronica's favourite costumes!

70050000014263.name: Trodain Set
70050000014263.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! Try on some traveller's togs that will show our hero in a whole new light!

70050000014264.name: Happy Adventurer Set
70050000014264.description: A special gift to thank you for playing the game! Packed full of helpful items that are sure to come in handy over the course of your adventures!

70050000014461.description:
Unlocks a new costume for Kohaku in the Base menu.
*Will not display during cut-scenes.

70050000014501.intro: A vibrant anime/action RPG with action-orientated combat in a unique Taipei setting.
70050000014501.description:
Allows Yumo to change the outfit in Tumaz Mart's Dressing room.
- Angel in white uniform (Only for Yumo)

Yumo the white angel. Next patient,please!

70050000014502.name: Dusk Diver - News anchor costume
70050000014502.intro: A vibrant anime/action RPG with action-orientated combat in a unique Taipei setting.
70050000014502.description:

70050000014603.name: Ryza's Costume "Summer Adventure!"
70050000014603.intro: Try on Ryza's Costume "Summer Adventure!" and set out on your adventures wearing cool and refreshing clothes!

70050000014606.name: Ryza's Outfit "Divertimento Embrace"
70050000014606.description:
Ryza's Outfit "Divertimento Embrace" is added. By installing this content, events concerning the outfit are also added.

*Ryza's Outfit "Divertimento Embrace" might be available as free content at a later date.

70050000014608.name: Hideout Parts "Pixie Forest"
70050000014608.intro: Use the parts to make your secret hideout look like the "Pixie Forest" that appears in the game!
70050000014608.description:
"Pixie Forest" parts used for remodeling your secret hideout are added. The hideout parts will also grant unique effects.
In order to remodel, you must have progressed the game to a certain point.

(Effects)
When the time is set to night, your allies' abilities will be raised slightly.

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014612.name: Hideout Parts "Lakeside Hideout"
70050000014612.intro: Use the parts to make your secret hideout look like a seaside town!
70050000014612.description:
"Lakeside Hideout" parts used for remodeling your secret hideout are added. The hideout parts will also grant unique effects.
In order to remodel, you must have progressed the game to a certain point.

(Effects)
When the weather is rainy, your allies' abilities will be raised slightly.

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014613.name: Costume Set "Another Fashion"
70050000014613.intro:
12 varieties of costumes are added!
Have Ryza, Lent, Tao, and Klaudia try them on!
70050000014613.description:
3 alternate colored costumes are added for Ryza, Lent, Tao, and Klaudia, for a total of 12 varieties.

(Costumes)
●Ryza's costumes
 - Midnight Black
 - Blue Skies
 - Sunny Smile

●Lent's costumes
 - Gothic Wolf
 - Forest Guardian
 - Desert Squall

●Tao's costumes
 - Twilight Raconteur
 - Wonder Pastel
 - Book Fairy

●Klaudia's costumes
 - White Princess
 - Pure Maiden
 - Strawberry Parfait

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014614.name: Costume Set "Summer Style"
70050000014614.intro:
Summer costumes for Lent, Tao, and Klaudia!
1 costume is added for each character for a total of 3 varieties!
70050000014614.description:
1 summer costume is added for Lent, Tao, and Klaudia, for a total of 3 varieties.

●Lent's costume
 - Warrior's Day Off

●Tao's costume
 - Island Explorer

●Klaudia's costume
 - Summer Memories

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014615.name: Initial Dash Item Set
70050000014615.intro:
Make the earlier portions of the game easier!
Obtain 2 gathering items!
70050000014615.description:
2 types of gathering items are added that will make the earlier portions of the game easier.

(Content)
●Wind Shoes
Effect: When equipped as your gathering item, your movement speed is increased.

●Knapsack
Effect: When equipped as your gathering item, the capacity of your basket is increased.

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014616.name: Extra Large! Rebuild Gem Pack
70050000014616.intro: An incredible 100,000 gems essential for rebuilding items are added!
70050000014616.description:
100,000 gems that can be used for rebuilding are added.
In order to rebuild items, you must have progressed the game to a certain point.

*This product is part of the DLC set for purchasers of the "Atelier Ryza: Digital Deluxe Edition".

70050000014641.name: Spirit Board Battle Set 2 - For Powerful Enemies
70050000014641.description:
This is a special offer for Nintendo Switch Online members.
You can download the following items free of charge for use in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate!

・1500 SP
・Rematch x5
・Damage 50% x5
・Weaken Minions x5
・Health Drain x5

70050000014741.name: Team Rocket Hat + Outfit
70050000014741.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Team Rocket's uniform is now available. The big R on black clothes is a sign that you're the real deal. Instead of having a Pokémon battle, though, you'll be getting your hands dirty as a Mii Brawler!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Team Rocket Hat
・ Team Rocket Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000014742.name: Goemon Wig + Outfit
70050000014742.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Goemon from the Mystical Ninja series (known in Japan as Ganbare Goemon) is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters only, and it lets you attack with Goemon's favourite pipe! Set your Mii Fighter's neutral special to Shuriken of Light to feel like you're throwing gold coins!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Goemon Wig
・ Goemon Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000014743.name: Sans Mask + Outfit
70050000014743.description:
Get ready for a skele-ton of fun! This Mii Fighter costume allows you to dress your Mii Gunner up as Sans from UNDERTALE. And if that's not enough, the included special arrangement of MEGALOVANIA will fill you with determination.

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Sans Mask
・ Sans Outfit (for Gunners)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

Music
・ MEGALOVANIA (Arrangement)
Usable after purchase by going to Vault → Sounds or by setting it in My Music.

70050000014744.name: Proto Man's Helmet + Armor
70050000014744.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Proto Man from the Mega Man series is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Gunners only, but the heroically hidden features of the solitary Proto Man might make you jump into battle whistling a familiar tune…

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Proto Man's Helmet
・ Proto Man's Armor (for Gunners)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000014745.name: Zero's Helmet + Armor
70050000014745.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Zero from the Mega Man X series is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Swordfighters only, which is a good fit for the Rank SA reploid. Take your blue Beam Saber and show your enemies the power of a Maverick Hunter!

This set contains the following:

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Zero's Helmet
・ Zero's Armor (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000014861.name: Heroes
70050000014861.description: Another 30 levels with low difficulty, easy to play. Levels are set in Pixel Action Heroes theme.

70050000014862.name: Nightland
70050000014862.description: This scene contains another 30 levels with medium difficulty. They take place during the night scene.

70050000014863.name: Desert
70050000014863.description: Next 30 levels are designed for tough players, because this set of 30 levels have higher difficulty. They are set in desert environment.

70050000014864.name: Aztec
70050000014864.description:
Next 30 levels are designed for tough players and are a
bit challenging to play. Levels are designed in Aztec style
visual.

70050000014865.name: Carrotville
70050000014865.description: The hardest 30 levels are really challenging to play and are designed for skilled players. Levels are designed in homeland of the bunnies style with many carrots in background.

70050000014881.name: Coins pack 01
70050000014881.description: Use coins to get extra bunnies so you can complete hard levels. Buy 1500 coins.

70050000014882.name: Coins pack 02
70050000014882.description: Use coins to get extra bunnies so you can complete hard levels. Buy 3000 coins and get extra 360 bonus coins.

70050000014883.name: Coins pack 03
70050000014883.description: Use coins to get extra bunnies so you can complete hard levels. Buy 5000 coins and get extra 1250 bonus coins.

70050000014885.name: Coins pack 05
